WEB-SITES

Each business needs a website. We consider every product or service individually: we create sites which inform, consult, sell, and, most importantly, work.

Benefits you will get

An Expert Advisor

Our professional team created web-sites for more than 250 products for hundreds of sellers.

Individual Approach

A team of specialists takes into account all the client’s wishes and makes effective suggestions.

High Professionalism

A whole team of more than 10 people of higher qualification in their specialties works on every project.

What we can do

Landing Page

  • One-page online prototype;

  • Adaptive development;

  • Testing and proofreading content;

  • Setting CMS and transferring to a hosting;

  • Installing additional plug-ins;

  • Help with purchase and setting of https certificates;

  • Setting of reserve copying of the website;

  • Setting of reserve copying of the website;

  • Setting and launch of Facebook, Instagram, Google ads (1 campaign).

Corporate Web-site

  • Multipage online-prototype;

  • Definition of interface structure;

  • Writing user stories;

  • Development of unique design;

  • Development and transfer to CMS;

  • Testing and content proofreading;

  • Transfer to a hosting;

  • Web-analytics and goal setting.

Online Stores

  • Researching the market and TA needs;

  • Defining UI structure;

  • Writing user stories;

  • Developing online-prototype;

  • Unique design;

  • Development and transfer to CMS;

  • Setting online payment;

  • Testing and proofreading content;

  • Setting web analytics and goals.

What you get

  • 1

    Analysis of brief and competitors

    A client describes a company, product or service, the purpose of the website. We analyse the brief, competitors, define the website type (landing, business card, corporate).

  • 2

    Prototype creation

    We think of the interface, define the website structure and make a prototype in Axure. In case of additional functionality, we write user stories.

  • 3

    Design development

    We write a technical task for the designer including the available content. We create website design and layout for development.

  • 4

    Website creation

    We create the site on the AM server. After the confirmation, we transfer it to CMS and write all the elements available for editing. We adapt the website for mobile devices.

  • 5

    Transfer to server

    We test the website, make adjustments, transfer it to a hosting, set web-analytics. And then we test the website on the client server for the second time.

  • 6

    Support

    We monitor the website 24/7. In case of any mistakes, we quickly react and make all the necessary adjustments.

Portfolio

Get Started

It will take you less than sixty seconds. A member of our team will contact you shortly after.
